Detailed Description

template<>
struct boost::gil::default_color_converter_impl< cmyk_t, rgb_t >

CMYK to RGB (not the fastest code in the world)

r = 1 - min(1, c*(1-k)+k) g = 1 - min(1, m*(1-k)+k) b = 1 - min(1, y*(1-k)+k)
